subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar reached an agreement with AT&T that will allow the company to sponsor Jeff Burton’s car through 2008. The agreement ends months of legal wrangling involving AT&T, Nascar and Sprint Nextel. AT&T sued Nascar over its refusal to allow it to replace Cingular as the primary sponsor of the Richard Childress Racing car after the telecommunications companies merged. Nascar prohibited the name change because of its exclusivity agreement with the series sponsor Sprint Nextel.
